Class Team

java.lang.Object
Team
public class Team extends Object
The Team class represents a football team and contains a list of players. It includes methods to display all players' names, add a player to the team, and simulate the team playing.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Team()
    Constructor to initialize a Team object with an empty list of players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPlayer(Player player)
    Add a player to the team.
    void
    play()
    Simulate the team playing by invoking the play method for each player.
    void
    showAllPlayers()
    Display the names of all players in the team.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
